medium: Cotton; warp-faced weave and supplementary weft patterning
title: Belt
description: Belt is cotton band of war-faed weave in red, white, grey stripes. 32 1/2\" at end of belt is weft-face patterning in ppink, blue, yellow, orange, and red.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons, Douglas Dawson Collection
